Name: FPS Robot Attack Minigame
About the game: This game was created with Unity on the basis of the Unity project 'FPS Microgame'. FPS Robot Attack Minigame is a 3D First Person Shooter Game where you have to destroy robots to save the world You can play both with the Joystick (any / Xbox favorite) and with the keyboard. - 19 Levels - 3 types of weapons DESTROY THE ROBOTS AND SAVE THE WORLD !!!!
